name: Latest release of the Android mode for Processing 4
body: This release is only compatible with Processing 4.0b8 and higher. It restores the integrated debugger: #686

name: Android Mode 406
body:
**4.5.0beta2 release of the Android mode**

This release is only compatible with Processing 4.0b8 and higher. It restores the integrated debugger: #686

name: Android Mode 405
body:
**4.5.0beta1 release of the Android mode**

This release is only compatible with Processing 4.0b8 and higher and includes work from Google Summer of Code 2022 by @rupeshkumar22 to bring back the emulator: #696

name: Android Mode 404
body:
**4.5.0alpha5 release of the Android mode**

This release is only compatible with Processing 4.0b8 and higher and includes the following fixes:

* #693: Restored export signed package
* #691: Signing validation error on bundle release

name: Android Mode 403
body:
**4.5.0alpha4 release of the Android mode**

This release is only compatible with Processing 4.0b8 and higher and includes the following fix:

* #663, #683: The renderer is queried from the preprocessor result when using size() and fullScreen()
* #687: The core, VR, and AR libraries are copied even if gradle skips building them because of changes in the code

name: Latest release of the Android mode for Processing 3
body:
**4.3.0 release of the Android mode**

This release is compatible only with Processing 3.x and includes:

* #646, #594: Exports signed Android App Bundles (aab) that are required for publishing on Google Play
* #662: Removed minimum SDK from sketch's manifest file
* #680: Fixed overlapping shortcuts in the mode
* https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/fa4429de11339425f79411e3cdef33484f9b1c8d: Updated target SDK platform to 30
* https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/fb59882b3ad659319153d07f919d22c9aa583978, https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/2f5380fabee08bf9c17398372a14b108aea9baf8, https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/47c0050290d434b1a3972ece4f3c91727406293c: Ported renderer fixes from Java mode

name: Android Mode 280
body:
**4.3.0 release of the Android mode**

This release is compatible only with Processing 3.x and includes:

* #646, #594: Exports signed Android App Bundles (aab) that are required for publishing on Google Play
* #662: Removed minimum SDK from sketch's manifest file
* #680: Fixed overlapping shortcuts in the mode
* https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/fa4429de11339425f79411e3cdef33484f9b1c8d: Updated target SDK platform to 30
* https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/fb59882b3ad659319153d07f919d22c9aa583978, https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/2f5380fabee08bf9c17398372a14b108aea9baf8, https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/47c0050290d434b1a3972ece4f3c91727406293c: Ported renderer fixes from Java mode

name: Android Mode 402
body:
**4.5.0alpha3 release of the Android mode**

This release is compatible with Processing 4.0b7 and includes all fixes and updates implemented in the 4.3.0 release of the mode:

* #646, #594: Exports signed Android App Bundles (aab) that are required for publishing on Google Play
* #662: Removed minimum SDK from sketch's manifest file
* fa4429d: Updated target SDK platform to 30
* fb59882, 2f5380f, 47c0050: Ported renderer fixes from Java mode
* https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/fa1441b9991107734e1222d18affe286faab8f95  : Temporary hack to detect the sketch's renderer, but fullScreen() is not supported yet, use the workaround mentioned here: #683

name: Version 4.5.0 Alpha 2 of the Android mode
body:
**Compatible with Processing 4.0 beta 1!**

This second alpha version of the Android mode fixes one issue that breaks sketch building on Windows:

* https://github.com/processing/processing-android/issues/665: Replace backward slashes with forward slashes

name: Version 4.5.0 Alpha 1 of the Android mode
body:
**Compatible with Processing 4.0 beta 1!**

This first alpha version of the Android mode has several changes under the hood to make it compatible with Processing 4. It has a number of known issues:

* The debugger is disabled
* Still uses Java 1.8 to build the sketches as Android apps
* The default renderer is broken for face watches
* SDK Downloader is broken due to some missing java dependencies

name: Android Mode 279
body:
**4.2.1 release of the Android mode**

This release includes:
* #598: Added lerpColor(int, int, float) function to PApplet
* #636, #639: Fixed availabilty checks for emulator
* #649: Updated permissions scrapping script to Python3/BeautifulSoup 4
* #652: Added gradle.org maven repo to solve google-vr dependencies
* #637: Copy 64bits native lib to gradle libs directory
* #645: Updated list of permissions
* #593: Added stereoscopy VR example
* #648: Fixed text in permission selector
* https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/927966f898ab1a8e21cde862c057cd9dc6a90058: Upgraded to Gradle 6.8.3
* https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/84a950cfccb26b95623212312a0e3e97dbef5793: Renamed some version variables for clarity

name: Android Mode 278
body:
**4.2.0 release of the Android mode**

This release includes:
*  #633: Update to target Android 10 (SDK level 29). Previous minimum SDK level for different app types are unchanged
*  #560: Migration to AndroidX - use of the deprecated support packages has been removed and androidx packages are used in their place
* #630: Update to use new javaCompileVariant in build files that require ECJ
* #629: Emulator is not downloaded initially alongside the SDK, its downloaded automatically by the SDK when running the first sketch
* #628: Include Gradle version in properties file
* #624: Set platform jar dependency correctly in build files
* #621: Downloads command-line tools instead of SDK tools, which have been deprecated
* #634: Bundle sdklib dependencies required by the SDK updater tool

name: Android Mode 277
body:
**4.1.1 release of the Android mode**

This release fixes several bugs found in version 4.1, update is highly recommended. Please check the list of closed issues in the [4.1.1 milestone](https://github.com/processing/processing-android/milestone/12?closed=1) for details.

name: Android Mode 276
body:
**4.1 release of the Android mode**

This release introduces a new library to create AR sketches, originally developed by [Syam Sundar Kirubakaran](https://github.com/SyamSundarKirubakaran), and a port of the integrated debugger in the Java mode, developed by [Manav Jain](https://github.com/manav-mj), both during GSoC 2018. It also updates the Android dependency to version 9 Pie (API level 28), and fixes several bugs.

Please check the list of closed issues in the [4.1 milestone](https://github.com/processing/processing-android/milestone/7?closed=1) for details.

name: Android Mode 275
body:
**4.1.0-beta4 release of the Android mode**

This new beta includes:
* #512: An easier-to-use, object-oriented AR API: https://github.com/processing/processing-android/issues/512#issuecomment-507110927
* #538: Initial implementations of VR convenience classes (selector, camera)

name: Android Mode 274
body:
**4.1.0-beta3 release of the Android mode**

This new beta includes:
* #512: A tentative API to access AR functionality: https://github.com/processing/processing-android/issues/512#issuecomment-497197222
* #265: Some progress with the experimental P2DX renderer: https://github.com/processing/processing-android/issues/265#issuecomment-498094984

name: Android Mode 273
body:
**4.1.0-beta2 release of the Android mode**

This new beta includes:
* #381: The Android menu allows to select between Cardboard and Daydream, by @SyamSundarKirubakaran
* #518: Native/shared libraries are copied to the correct location, and support for TensorFlow Lite format, by @irealva
* Default icon names and locations follow latest conventions in Android (res/mipmap/ic_launcher), but old names (icon-xy) are still supported
* Various updates from Java mode, including the new circle, square, push, pop functions, and fixes to attribute handling.

name: Android Mode 272
body:
**4.1.0-beta1 release of the Android mode**

Version 4.1.0-beta1 introduces a new AR rendering library, wrapping Google's AR Core API, developed by [Syam Sundar Kirubakaran](https://github.com/SyamSundarKirubakaran), and an integrated debugger, identical in functionality to that available in the Java mode, developed by [Manav Jain](https://github.com/manav-mj). These features are still tested and debugged as part of the [4.1 milestone](https://github.com/processing/processing-android/milestone/7).

name: Android Mode 271
body:
**4.0.4 release of the Android mode**

Version 4.0.4 fixes a critical bug that caused the app cache to grow continuously after each app restart (https://github.com/processing/processing-android/issues/506).

Please check the list of closed issues in the [4.0.4 milestone](https://github.com/processing/processing-android/milestone/10?closed=1) for details.

name: Android Mode 270
body:
**4.0.3 release of the Android mode**

Version 4.0.3 of the Android mode fixes a number of important issues related to memory management found in earlier versions of the mode, in addition to some improvements in the handling of non-looping and live wallpaper sketches. Also, this version of the mode includes an experimental OpenGL renderer for 2D graphics, temporarily called P2DX, contributed by @hazmatsuitor and discussed in [this thread](https://github.com/processing/processing/issues/5256). Note that the implementation of this renderer is not yet complete, although it should be usable for simple sketches. 

Please check the list of closed issues in the [4.0.3 milestone](https://github.com/processing/processing-android/milestone/9?closed=1) for details.

name: Android Mode 269
body:
**4.0.2 release of the Android mode**

Version 4.0.2 of the Android mode fixes a number of issues found in 4.0.1. Also, the build system has bee substantially revamped. You can find the updated build instructions in the project's [wiki](https://github.com/processing/processing-android/wiki/Building-Processing-for-Android).

Please check the list of closed issues in the [4.0.2 milestone](https://github.com/processing/processing-android/milestone/8?closed=1) for details.

name: Android Mode 0268
body:
**4.0.1 release of the Android mode**

Version 4.0.1 of the Android mode fixes several issues found in 4.0. Please check the list of closed issues in the [4.0.1 milestone](https://github.com/processing/processing-android/issues?q=is%3Aissue+milestone%3A%224.0.1+bugfix%22+is%3Aclosed) for details.

name: Android Mode 0267
body:
**4.0 release of the Android mode**

Version 4.0 of the Android mode supporting live wallpapers, watch faces, and VR apps. It also uses Gradle as the build system. It is compatible with Processing 3.1+

Issues fixed and updates implemented for this release are listed [here](https://github.com/processing/processing-android/issues?q=is%3Aissue+milestone%3A%224.0+final%22+is%3Aclosed 
).

name: Android Mode 0266
body:
**Version 4.0 Release Candidate 3 of the Android mode**

Compatible with Processing 3.1+

*Fixes*
- Connect to watch paired over Bluetooth even if emulator is running: #377
- Don't trigger mouse events when detecting taps in watch faces #388
- Make sure that required watch face and VR permissions don't get erased: #390
- Don't force new manifest when opening Permissions Selector: #393
- Use correct path for keystore backup: #394
- Additional PID parsing from logcat output: https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/45a5c7019ccb2a518f8349c46c0b8e7e0692c277 

*Enhancements*
- Use only one thread to update device list: #387
- Remove main() method from exported code: #392
- Minor UI tweaks on Windows: #383
- Don't print unnecessary warnings from adb: #384
- Throw exception when trying to use pixels array in A2D renderer not backed up by bitmap object: #391

name: Android Mode 0265
body:
**Version 4.0 Release Candidate 2 of the Android mode**

Compatible with Processing 3.1+

*Fixes*
- Use absolute path to adb: #382
- Repeated orientation changes don't exhaust memory: #243

*Enhancements*
- Wait until emulator booted up before installing sketch: #379 
- Don't ask AVD arch if already one AVD installed: #375
- Show information message when detecting devices w/out permission: #374

name: Android Mode 0264
body:
**Version 4.0 Release Candidate 1 of the Android mode**

Compatible with Processing 3.1+

*Major changes and updates*
- Use Gradle as build system: #307
- Incorporate SDKUpdater tool: https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/9dfff6e645718b69d879d81b4b4052365c6389cd, https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/2f8fba3d1201174f77126ba9ff9bc0ef325b4c0a
- Download Android SDK and system images from latest repositories: https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/3ca8db92d4e042bff04aac47e134ba99da08159e, https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/9b78586d3cbfa639adb4a93789b529496e816f87
- Create AVDs with avdmanager tool: https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/b02535ceede3e27e9d3b6ca114f46dd9bcc357f6
- HDPI support on Windows: #354
- Reworked system image download, includes HAXM install: #369
- Android SDK is downloaded to sketchbook/android/sdk: #367
- SDK path in preferences is prioritized over ANDROID_SDK environmental variable: #372

*Fixes*
- Connect to bluetooth-paired watch when emulator is running: #377
- Start animation thread in watch faces: #376 
- Find zipaling in build-tools subfolders: #377 
- Add AVD skin to config file: #366
- Restart emulator if user closed it: #365
- Start animation thread when surface view has been created: #351
- Added welcome message: https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/0bc2e9f027d9aa2abed504aacf50496bc154a0a8
- Fixed path to USB driver: https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/687eebd0ce7bd9485d276eb86a553d32d7b3b230
- Added AndroidUtil class: https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/b98252a1f19aee339597a57899c132aabbe31e98, https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/a2c4218bc3ee00511cdda8d393603bf85b3c6907
- Can install ARM images after installing x86: https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/85582d07b0a186ce1ca241d8a47c5c4a2729ca19
- Read output from zipalign: https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/d2d0d106733696357b0d5f4d45b05e2e380e9622
- Line shader and pre-processor fixes: https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/d2d0d106733696357b0d5f4d45b05e2e380e9622, https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/d63560963712f296c9023be1af706a1ab53b14b2
- General refactoring: https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/53b4cfef99b9be304549336c4424f3c7a8ec3f75, https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/2590e6696cd6317fce463ba0d287503b3a3cc8e2

name: Android Mode 0263
body:
**Version 4.0-beta10 of the Android mode**

Compatible with Processing 3.1+, last beta before RCs.

*Changes & fixes*
- Hard-coded last versions of SDK tools that bundle ant build scripts and android tool: https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/cf8dc491d92c56ec5613a8f23cbf097903e2f463
- Ported a few fixes from RC1: #357 and #251

name: Android Mode 0262
body:
**Version 4.0-beta9 of the Android mode**

Compatible with Processing 3.1+

*Changes & fixes*
- VR API nearing completion: https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/13e2d9ab9a4a11e454fefb4441d03001e2ad248a, https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/b1b055d7cc7dd7e21b62a5c89b35fae70b08515f, https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/c886fd85e7410e774c1b8f2a96f3d2cb088df546, https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/1f6d2050edd30dbfaefdf7aa1e5e950e90093f06, https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/490fbb513906510a169a776733e3d13984f733c7,
https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/a706a8b3e5aaf547138e5c9719a6a4745829f6c6
- Added some Activity methods to PApplet to maintain backwards compatibility: https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/72a9505552f018942e8d6c1147790b5fd3cee056
- Call the permission handling method in the main looper thread: https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/055d56b2523a56d253a560b9fed50a64b63a248d
- Handle null bitmap in loadImage(): #339
- Set pixelWidth/Height/Density of vessel in AsyncImageLoader: #340 
- Implemented LINE_STRIP and LINE_LOOP in the Android2D renderer: https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/90b3e52cf66a05698c7122be95bd4506c3ada156
- Use current camera mode when setting eye transformation: https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/3e70df9ba2c316b4c390edfa67be1ba5af9045d4
- Implement getMatrix(PMatrix2D) in PGraphics2D: https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/85890ad4e589f2fdf7985959f2b09f6826516727

name: Android Mode 0261
body:
**Version 4.0-beta8 of the Android mode**

Compatible with Processing 3.1+

*Changes & fixes*
- Don't call pause/resume twice: #334
- Add sized flag to recreate bitmap and canvas: #324
- Warn about default package name and missing icons: #327
- Reset manifest when changing component: #283
- Permission manager removes previous permissions: #326
- Copy assets into gradle project: #329
- Added onCreate() and onActivityResult() to PFragment and PApplet: https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/d39ae3edab4330f271db8c2f17262282c1b9b89a
- Store target SDK in preferences file: https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/81381635cd2163f4bffb775e58bc367ff07961f0
- Hardcode max tool versions to avoid breaking the mode: https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/e5faea6665d77cbd0bad04fd32ca2277fca3dd97
- Fixed inverted pixel error: https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/a591e0d39cecbc0bafa4855df568cb39730e6071
- Added ENABLE_KEY_REPEAT hint: https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/c0624aade788889c96d4756fc67c621a3f2f43c2
- Removed deprecated wear and wallpaper variables: https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/0f0017d49f8cafb48177fb269e01798faa67dc4b
- Select correct vertex winding: https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/10dbfad7047d195d6d1cd145211aca2ec7d5a61a
- Simplified fragment embedding API: https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/52f461785f1879cbf3991d999372a37657f9c3f0
- Added ViewIdGenerator: https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/a43374ce73e18a8a209b6a7ab885166b985d1541
- Use reconfigure() when bitmap has enough space: https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/2ba7381ba6c0d20ccf36c618fa2a991f4dbfab60
- Fixed text orientation: https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/e4df27dde3c5ec8a86abc1705f58057a1d79bec3
- Call request handler method even if the app already has the permission: https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/9d4c4b0447d9f1e8eede6e799850c4b13cef01e8
- Renamed setEyeTransform() as eye(): https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/14ae2b4d12e16d359e4da4f8a2bae8e3e1f1e44a
- Added getRenderer, vrCoordinates, registerUpdate to VR library: https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/21905729901669226aa9aa16ecbec794e858fb00
- Moved gvr jars to library folder: https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/0e01fc190b56f496c5cc5b8296433fa7218b028a

name: Android Mode 0260
body:
**Version 4.0-beta7 of the Android mode**

Compatible with Processing 3.1+

*VR fixes and improvements*
- Renamed Cardboard as VR: https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/a04854c4025010323ad47aa93bdd5c15726538c6
- Added drawAim example: https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/7d9fb56abca337bd5ec2c3d0d8cd614e03650d31
- Updated to GVR SDK 1.40.0: https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/17bd90f166ed1035b27f94b4f6833cc83db34eb3
- Fixed permission request for VR: #319
- Fixed normal orientation issues, lighting should work as expected now: https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/b431c0cd83d575ed32b75a8f29b44c1970d844fc

*Other fixes:*
- Implemented external handling: https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/354cb0aa9fb0025262dd6a1a09adc643064d98f0

name: Android Mode 0259
body:
**Version 4.0-beta6 of the Android mode**

Compatible with Processing 3.1+

*New API:*
- Wallpaper and watch faces: https://github.com/processing/processing-android/issues/313
- Permission handling for critical/dangerous permissions: https://github.com/processing/processing-android/issues/312
- Simplify layout embedding, layout() method in sketch no longer needed: https://github.com/processing/processing-android/issues/252
- Added open and close functionality of Soft keyboard: https://github.com/processing/processing-android/pull/305

*Fixes:*
- PGraphics crash in watch faces: https://github.com/processing/processing-android/issues/311
- Properly load materials properties in OBJ file: https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/842cbf3a4003f3ca3a620b9ffe36dbf2fbb17e2e

name: Android Mode 0258
body:
**Version 4.0-beta5 of the Android mode**

Compatible with Processing 3.1+

Several fixes and updates:
- Export Gradle Android Project: https://github.com/processing/processing-android/issues/244
- Finalized touch API: https://github.com/processing/processing-android/issues/226
- Support repository and library are dowloaded alongside the platform SDK, so no need to bundle wear and support packages: https://github.com/processing/processing-android/issues/306
- Better permission request dialog for watch faces: https://github.com/processing/processing-android/issues/298
- Fixed various issues with with emulator execution/installation: https://github.com/processing/processing-android/issues/299
- Don't add watch to the list of devices: https://github.com/processing/processing-android/issues/302
- Refactored sketch creation mechanism in wallpapers and watch faces: https://github.com/processing/processing-android/issues/237
- Properly display clickable links in message dialogs: https://github.com/processing/processing-android/issues/293

name: Android Mode 0257
body:
**Version 4.0-beta4 of the Android mode**

Compatible with Processing 3.1+

Several fixes and updates:
- Show warning when calling modelX/Y/Z in P2D: https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/36e2192580f74309f04b08c46d51abe069f346ec
- Improved handling of display metrics: https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/cab353f97a1a062f67b2f64123bd30ad6b9fcea2
- Avoid calling resume() before setup(): #252 
- New parsing of start and kill proc messages from logcat: #277
- Updated wallpaper API: https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/fe4dbb30c334c57914662eff03e66a5f3ffcbb6e, https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/c29dd0495b2bee3b64f11243f6c36de8ac9e2ad6
- Updated PVector with latest changes from Java mode: https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/09ece82985860a17c0cd1759abfafdfbfb0eef23
- Fixed wallpaper creation: #282
- Ported refactoring of GL-resource disposal mechanism: https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/394fa89b181bb018a9f388d6d4ec820b0a2f2419
- Ported core and data updates from Java mode: https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/751c5e89981d1c08b4e153305f8288263959d83e
- Fix build if the cardboard/library folder doesn't exist: #285
- Keep track of transformation stack in Android2D to avoid using canvas.save()/restore(): #287
- Implemented clipping in Android2D: #288 
- Put back PApplet.getActivity() to avoid breaking older code/libraries: https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/1dd4cc22e9e930f1b836b5d96717b9bef7eaf802
- Add showMessage() function to AndroidMode to allow for info text with embedded links: #289
- Set size of fonts in Android2D: #248
- Updated wear packages to 2.0.0: updated wear to 2.0.0: https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/161e04f6a325fe1aeaa13f35cbf7ecd4deb5adfa

name: Android Mode 0256
body:
**Version 4.0-beta3 of the Android mode**

Compatible with Processing 3.1+

Includes support for live wallpapers, watch faces, and Cardboard apps. All is bundled with the mode, no need of additional libraries.
- Cardboard library is now bundled with the mode: https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/e33eb0afc51bebbc6f9f49696a9f54587f7ed879
- Wearable jar is bundled in all components, because it is needed to resolve the dependencies of the watch face classes even if they are not being used in the sketch: https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/fa61a0fb2fff9c6dd47dbecbb3f7511f1fb57b53
- Don't exit app if permissions are not granted, just show warning: #238
- Manifest file is formatted with 4 spaces indentation for better readability: #240
- Disable mode is SDK tools don't have executable permissions and show message: #259
- Merged fixes from mode4 branch: #267
- Removed permission request dialog in live wallpapers, as they break renderer: #269
- Build files, xml resources, and Java source code used to construct the Android project when building/running a sketch are now templates: #270
- Added gradle wrapper and gradle build files to build the mode, core and cardboard libraries: #271
- Updated wearable and GVR SDK to latest stable versions: 1.4.0 and 1.10.0, respectively: #272
- Ported GL fixes/updates from Java mode: https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/081eaf64ad1a8a24cb7c2f8af65db9a1e3e59430
- Save/restore style in onPause/onResume: https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/92cbdc2f02a67dd0b0daa6bbfbf28d9bc85eb42b
- Added preApply(PMatrix) method to PMatrix: https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/5fd9ed1074368f93a118682ed9d46af345bc39aa
- Implement recording to PDF in PShapeOpenGL: https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/05818f39390634cf8d916a1dbbc1bfa2ee1864b6
- Added higher resolution icons: https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/01ac8a99936ebed63fb320ce060e632d6d0266b4
- Ported PApplet updates from Java mode: https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/e934b722660916cbf1d04641f0debf587ff9259c
- Ported changes/fixes in data package from Java mode: https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/3b61f4384a142a19f3e7788c2d2c87f4ab04112a
- Handle setting of z coordinate in 2D shapes: https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/4b0d09e2de56dc8fdb984f90172852bf808a472d
- Removed superflous permissions in watch faces and cardboard: https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/5c670205ba63b9c93973435377b6db914f558749, https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/c958737253f86dcef41ecf18037e1c72b826d983
- Removed glview.onPause() call from stopThread: https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/0212b8399f82f6765b98616523b954df73cd1ee0
- Added utility scripts for package update: https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/7f891486dc782399e90b5bfc53f19eb21d33572d, https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/1cf0602e8435e3ef3bcd773b212487eb31d4213f, https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/fb3fd5888af1fc0be79235a6718328ec23d28a14

name: Android Mode 0253
body:
**3.0.2 release of the Android mode**

Final bugfix release before version 4 of the mode. Compatible with Processing 3.0+
- Format manifest file with space tabs, to improve legibility #240
- Show a warning if "dangerous" permissions are not granted by the user, but don't quit app, #238
- Use Activity.finish() when exiting, should solve #217
- Show message when cannot run adb due to permission denier error, #259
- Add onRequestPermissionsResult() handler to main activity only if SDK is 23 or higher, #268
- Ported various fixes from mode4, #267

name: Android Mode 0255
body:
**Version 4.0-beta2 of the Android mode**

Compatible with Processing 3.1+

Includes support for live wallpapers, watch faces, and Cardboard apps (with [this library](https://github.com/codeanticode/processing-cardboard), needs to be installed manually)

##Changes:
- Added new permissions: https://github.com/processing/processing-android/issues/229
- Unified API to get context: https://github.com/processing/processing-android/issues/227
- Ported fixes from 3.0.1: https://github.com/processing/processing-android/issues/234
- Implemented permission handling for services: https://github.com/processing/processing-android/issues/235
- Use sketch.properties to store selected component: https://github.com/processing/processing-android/issues/222

name: Android Mode 0252
body:
**3.0.1 release of the Android mode**

Compatible with Processing 3.0+
- Use brief option for logcat, fixes #216
- Request "dangerous" permissions after app install, #225 
- Ported blend() fixes from Java2D: https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/24acabb15016fc193f4b70373ec05d6c3c1c5491, fixes #218 
- Fixed handling of pixels and bitamp in PImage: https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/161137e2b20c9199016b2dee4f98ee82fa88d63a
- Fixed use of pixels array in some examples: https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/241a61c26724df38898c6d9d9c70394f34b0c46f
- Use ARM EABi system image on Windows and Linux: https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/f2527010aed84bbbb28900e36e3dacf7288b40a6, fixes #220 
- Removed use of deprecated canvas.getMatrix(): https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/978991d1ebca15c355145920836f69ba856fdb22
- Parses all versions of platforms, so latest versions are downloaded, #233

name: Android Mode 0251
body:
**3.0 release of the Android mode**

Compatible with Processing 3.0+
- Ported OBJ fixes from Java mode: https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/3a10d8f2e1e0d30340b9541c018d3909a6fc3376
- Better logic for SDK download: https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/1cd09dcd36f41b0f93de99a3f3c848d2f4349336
- New icons: https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/c262d998bbeb30e88b1aea7411f251b575383df0, https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/95c89f5f116aa4e331b3d4a8f9666c714092761d
- Emulator works again: https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/bff4f230193baa83a2e9330eb48d6387979d2747
- Download system image for emulator separately: https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/c7ad37a2a15ca02531ceb21e79e1e086e20326b5

name: Android Mode 0254
body:
**Version 4.0-beta1 of the Android mode**

Compatible with Processing 3.1+

Includes support for live wallpapers, watch faces, and Cardboard apps (with [this library](https://github.com/codeanticode/processing-cardboard), needs to be installed manually)

name: Android Mode 0250
body:
**Release Candidate 4 for version 3.0 of the Android mode**

Compatible with Processing 3.0.x and 3.1
- Set visibility on resume, so navigation bar does not remain visible: https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/dd60471d17b018bd159cbf8983ed4fbc965bd139
- Save previous texture in tessellator only if tex cache in non-null: https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/c382956cdf6bf5ee1a2f441112533c703791576e, fixes https://github.com/processing/processing-android/issues/208
- Use version and api-level to identify a platform: https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/18688719daafde8a98b4d4ccf30d5204dcaf2b91, fixes https://github.com/processing/processing-android/issues/205
- Set default width/height: https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/1b26c39507491bc5f88eafc1e67fe7c75dfaeef4, fixes #211
- Static GL sketches don't disappear: https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/dd0c24643ba74b997e07a406abcf440911b46032, fixes https://github.com/processing/processing-android/issues/147
- Cancel timer updating devices when editor is closed: https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/d30f412459579ff0c953e1235e0fa189efd68ef2, fixes https://github.com/processing/processing-android/issues/209
- Better screen size detection: https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/68bcb2d5041d2f95440e37f24a27161b29cbbb95
- Release surface in PApplet.dispose(): https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/5406e0d40f62386b161496f30166363ec306d281
- Use SDK 17 for building (minimum SDK continues to be 15): https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/531425e61bfe34371f4f121ceff5a1806961c954

name: Android Mode 0249
body:
**Release Candidate 3 for version 3.0 of the Android mode**

Compatible with 3.0, 3.0.1 and 3.0.2
- More fixes for text rendering in OpenGL: https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/7a0e2f284fd10f3ebd46ea64d29c65d3775b88d9
- Reworked size-setting logic: https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/6ae45c9d90e0766ae4d82b18178767937989d43e, https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/5680a18256c64542d3346df64f91ae18a0a535c1, https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/704d6089845cf757eec08c23b153a9bb2ec59773
- Fixed SDK search & download UI: https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/16b244d521865a06090986987fad4a0114b9aa52, https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/d67affe60cb3bffb8f61270f2179579b198b6dce, https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/c41455d5dd85b8c0866c1d33636e8b70fa62d198, https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/b7a5507a92821ef3640e9afb4f602dcc5e6c5dd8

name: Android Mode 0248
body:
**Release Candidate 2 for version 3.0 of the Android mode**

Compatible with 3.0, 3.0.1 and 3.0.2
- Ported latest gl changes from java mode: https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/fa513f807deffecee4e8370cc3c6e15f91c3549e

name: Android Mode 0247
body:
**Release Candidate 1 for version 3.0 of the Android mode**

Compatible with 3.0, 3.0.1 and 3.0.2
- Various GL fixes ported from Java mode: https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/a93a62d79f02cac06150f099bf07a25e233bbe9c, https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/565116b1afa3ac74350c77d572a19753ab23d198
- Removed deprecated GL constant: https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/c2bbe93250572e32d394e5e072a1f8b0e82ee153
- Added parse/load/save JSONArray/JSONObject methods: https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/5d3c4c802b4fcb9b1954ccbdbf020f9d0f97dec6
- Fixed issues with the search path: https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/0574ddd1c7f3a77352d4d4695789f3941343987c, https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/2dcb964a318a61cc91f2e81b46ba2362c1650076
- Added blendMode to style: https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/4b8b3d0c4346126efeb20bdfa17f05979ada6da0
- Added vararg versions of println() and print(): https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/f93b0f49e701ccb049113eb29ffef947a42caf2e

name: Android Mode 0246
body:
Bugfix release compatible with Processing 3.0 and 3.0.1:
- GL fixes from Java mode: https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/28165aedcf2646b19cfdcba45e41ae2097a66ca3, https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/f20506e60aa41aa469cd138b80ffc6cd175032f4
- Use SDK name to differentiate SDKs with same number: https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/7a341366580ee9dec99e71a21ef76ea572b89fcb
- Fixed NPE when invoking get() and get(x, y, w, h): https://github.com/processing/processing-android/issues/154
- Make sure that android binaries are marked as executables: https://github.com/processing/processing-android/issues/176
- Improvements to the SDK installation messages: https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/3965235caf3657f355e5b7dff8dba1f3ce3ae945, https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/11f068566c88a0680b2c231dd43ab9f9a7b86f92
- Fixed NPE in getSearchPath(): https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/c00cf3c88ea00ee673cf090530c39c064f3256ee
- Fixed sensor examples: https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/fdf4955e3349f8967ecd6da87efe9fa22745168d

name: Android Mode 0245
body:
Release of the Android mode compatible with Processing 3.0!
- Uses latest base API, which fixes https://github.com/processing/processing-android/issues/152 and https://github.com/processing/processing-android/issues/151
- Ported most recent GL fixes from Java mode: https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/28165aedcf2646b19cfdcba45e41ae2097a66ca3, https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/d307a9593d3e850dd7bfa67e2a7ff2f02cfecee0
- Updated theme files: https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/199f51e52fbc1419f8eefd58168c7071ee8dd987

name: Android Mode 0244
body:
Release of the Android mode compatible with Processing 3.0 beta7.
- It fixes "incremental" drawing https://github.com/processing/processing-android/issues/147, but static sketches or sketches with noLoop() do not work properly.
- It addresses memory leaks https://github.com/processing/processing/issues/3858 with fixes ported from Java mode https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/fb8feaf4019d6b31ba51259a3dcfb7c695d9fe2e

name: Android Mode 0243
body: Compatible with Processing 3.0 beta 6. It ports all fixes in the OpenGL renderer in the Java mode. It also solves the import errors reported [here](https://github.com/processing/processing-android/issues/132) and [here](https://github.com/processing/processing-android/issues/128).

name: Android Mode 0242
body: Release compatible with Processing 3.0 beta5

name: Android Mode 0241
body: This version requires Android SDK 15 or newer. It also uses Fragment instead of Activity as the base class for PApplet.

name: Android Mode 0239
body:
Fixed release of the Android mode for 3.0 alpha 11. It includes:
- updates to the latest API change in core: https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/0edcc2b1dd4ce92bb12ad9b20cb0aad81b6d74fb
- improved AVD creation: https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/1cd33d50a86f75d29a84c1f3d1108a6ae30edf57, https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/51b0409355c8d3c78d1a9b5862abc2e9edc1b72b

name: Android Mode 0238
body:
Release of the Android mode for Processing 3.0a11 and newer.

Incorporates numerous fixes and improvements from [Umair Khan](https://github.com/omerjerk) as part of [GSoC 2015](https://www.google-melange.com/gsoc/homepage/google/gsoc2015):
- Updated to use latest API changes in processing-java: https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/44932853368d33b17781c69ab8f707e7387aae47, https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/57d1f7c505e80c41041a1d1bd799d0e0d1da7e85, https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/aaaac8c5b82a08638d181048ef0213721bb984d3, https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/6388cf2bd4d5c84abaa94a5274143392ae9c8378, https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/aae0c14d429d5ae356147b98cc7be584e6d4b38f, https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/0de2773a2d4951d5874b09d9c1477dfb4de883a8
- Make ABI selectable while creating new AVD: https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/ff8fd7f8cfcd31b6c11268110ec23d076e005b31
- Check for connected devices properly: https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/973ac89fc46c86fbb9b8d429c6214cc9dd425c88
- Handle run and stop button actions: https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/d5c101e233adc3e0121be5827764cb84c64f929c

Other contributions:
- Fix Table.insertRow from @b2renger: https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/7abbb04b4b5b721046ee6ca437b337d241242e4d
- Added no title bar by default from @redraw: https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/e0cee0bb7885676ddc8634a56987b19a65e87bef
- arc() fix from @qianlvable: https://github.com/processing/processing-android/commit/867b5df789e596e87488ac4c9a45737720f729fb

name: Android Mode 0228
body: Android Mode for Processing 0228 and newer (3.0+)
